          <title>
            <string language="en">Electric current flow through a solution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrischer Strom fließen eine Lösung durch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le courant électrique traversent une solution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A corrente elétrica corre através de uma 
solução</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La corrente elettrica attraversa una soluzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρική παρούσα ροή μέσω μιας λύσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La corriente eléctrica atraviesa una solución</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the direction of movement of charged particles between electrodes in a sodium chloride solution.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrolysis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ions current flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium chloride solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Bewegungsrichtung der 
belasteten Partikel zwischen Elektroden in einer 
Natriumchloridlösung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la direction du 
mouvement des particules chargées entre les électrodes dans une 
solution de chlorure de sodium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o sentido de movimento 
de partículas carregadas entre os elétrodos em uma solução do 
cloreto de sodium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il senso di movimento
delle particelle caricate fra gli elettrodi in una soluzione del 
cloruro di sodio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την κατεύθυνση της 
μετακίνησης των χρεωμένων μορίων μεταξύ των ηλεκτροδίων σε μια 
λύση χλωριούχου νατρίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la dirección del 
movimiento de partículas cargadas entre los electrodos en una 
solución del cloruro de sodio.</string>
          </description>
